dct_title_s: Map of the states of Ohio, Indiana and Illinois with the settled part of Michigan; engraved by J. H. Young.; Title on cover: Mitchell's map of Ohio, Indiana, Illinois & Michigan MiU
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Prime meridian: Washington. "Sold by Mitchell & Hinman." Insets: Vicinity of Detroit -- Vicinity of Cincinnati -- Falls of Ohio -- Lead region east of the Mississippi River. Includes table of steamboat routes. 1 map: hand col.; 42 x 54 cm
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
